name: sapick-astro
title: Sapick Astro
desc: A SaaS template designed specifically for IT and startup companies, built with Tailwind CSS.
article:
Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4

Key Features :

  • 12+ Unique Pages
  • 100/100 Google PageSpeed Score on Desktop
  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • Built with Tailwind CSS
  • Netlify & Vercel setting pre-configured
  • Contact Form
  • Taxonomy support
  • Support Disqus Comments
  • Write and update content in Markdown / MDX
  • MDX components auto-import
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Compatible with all modern browsers
  • SEO Friendly
  • Animation on scroll
  • Free Google fonts
  • Lifetime free updates
  • Detail Documentation

Unique Pages :

  1. Homepage
  2. About Us
  3. Services
  4. Pricing
  5. Features
  6. Team
  7. Testimonials
  8. Blog
  9. Blog Single Post
  10. Contact Us
  11. Career
  12. Login
  13. Signup
  14. 404 Error Page
